reviewText:
Yes!
we enjoyed it.  It works very well.
Thank you.
Seven year olds enthralled.  What more could you ask?

Though this DVD is the short version,the animation could have very well been done by Hanna Barbera.
I know plenty of kids that love this movie because of its well done story,voices,soundtrack,animation,etc.
Maybe the other reviewer's classroom was bored because they were forced to watch it for a grade.
The concept of being stranded on an island is feared & adored by most.
"Old school" animation as my third graders termed it. They did watch it but with limited interest.
